comment: After updating Instagram I have VERY issue in my account 1- I can not see comments on reel 2- I can't see my profile and I can go to my saved option 3- when I see this type I think their must be some issues so I log out and then try to login but now I can't login to my account 馃槕馃槕 So, I am requesting Instagram to look into this issue and pls solve it because It is not a problem with one account I can't login to my other account also
scenarios: After updating Instagram, the user cannot see comments on a reel.
After updating Instagram, the user cannot see their profile and cannot access the saved option.
The user logs out due to the above issues and attempts to log back in but cannot log in to their account. Additionally, they cannot log in to another account either.
key sentence: After updating Instagram, the user cannot see their profile and cannot access the saved option.
the function of activity: This activity involves managing user profiles and interactions, creating and editing content, exploring media, and adjusting privacy and notification settings on a social media platform.
the sub-task list of state: [{'name': 'View Profile', 'description': "View the user's profile page including their posts, followers, and following details."}, {'name': 'Edit Profile', 'description': operations.event: click
